decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (A16/SA277/10, Received: 20/04/2016
1358_CHISWICK HIGH ROAD_BUILDING SURVEY ELEVATIONS 1, 2, 3, 4, Received: 25/04/2016
A16/SA277/01, Received: 04/05/2016
Daylight & Sunlight Report, Received: 08/06/2016
A16/SA277/12A, 1st 2nd 3rd FLOOR PLAN (existing), Unnumbered Existing Plans Mortlake House, Received: 06/07/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 3 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8:00am  to 6:00pm on Mondays to Friday and 9 :00am to 1:00pm on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
description: Insertion of four windows to the eastern elevation and seven windows to the western elevation
